issue.title: [Java] Provide API access to "custom_metadata" Field attribute in IPC setting
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-482](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-482). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is necessary for supplying application-specific type metadata.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-482?focusedCommentId=15987019) by Emilio Lahr-Vivaz (elahrvivaz):*
I'm going to work on this if no one else has claimed it. Thanks,

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-482?focusedCommentId=15990370) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I moved this to 0.4. Would like to release again in 1 month or so (or sooner, depending on progress)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-482?focusedCommentId=16007163) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 611
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/611>
